txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Orcs and Uruks within Ost Magol are close to finding what they seek: a powerful, dark energy to fuel their foul ambitions. We are barely able to stand against them now, but if they discover a new power to aid them in battle, all will be lost.\n\n'Search the ruins and defeat the Orcs and Uruks who are hunting within.'
'The Orcs shall return... the power of Ost Magol is too tempting for them to resist. For now, though, the ruins are quiet.'
'If the Orcs and Uruks find a darkness to power their evil, we shall not be able to withstand it.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Orcs and Uruks have been defiling Ost Magol with totems of their dark leaders.
Defeated Orcs and Uruks in Ost Magol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Orcs and Uruks in Ost Magol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orcs and uruks can be found at Ost Magol.\n\nAldbéort asked you to venture into Ost Magol and defeat the Orcs and Uruks within.
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear the Orcs and Uruks in Ost Magol have been defeated.
